1.0.name: wordpress/simple-image-watermark
1.0.description:
This plugin allowes you to add watermark to your images "on the fly". Watermark was added while image is uploaded. You can choose image sizes on which watermark will be apllied.

Configuration is simple:

  • choose image sizes
  • upload watermark
  • choose watermark position
  • enter margins for best positioning

If any questions visit plugin homepage

Website

http://www.2klabs.com/

Documentation

http://www.2klabs.com/siw
